text: King Diamond (born Kim Bendix Petersen, Copenhagen, Denmark, on June 14, 1956) is a Grammy Award-nominated heavy metal musician. As a vocalist, he is known for his extensive vocal range, in particular his usage of falsetto. He is the lead vocalist for both bands Mercyful Fate and King Diamond. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Danish singers Category:Heavy metal singers Category:Musicians from Copenhagen Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: King Diamond
